product_name: Badfish MCIT Inflatable Stand Up Paddle Board - 9'
long_description: This durable inflatable paddle board uses Multi Chamber Inflatable Technology to create a stiff and stable platform for outstanding performance on flatwater and surf, and even whitewater.
short_description: This durable inflatable paddle board uses Multi Chamber Inflatable Technology to create a stiff and stable platform for outstanding performance on flatwater and surf, and even whitewater.
